author: Ron Miller
title: Salesforce’s Benioff pledges no ‘significant’ layoffs for 90s days
description: In a Twitter thread on Tuesday, Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff outlined an eight-step plan to keep people safe and find treatments and a vaccine for the COVID-19 virus, all while working to find a way to get people back to work safely. He also asked that all CEO…
